jobs_info.Data Description:
Collaboration tool between Telstra Business (TB) end
 
                                        customers and TB CSRs to help customers with sales,
 
                                        service, and support, without calling in.
jobs_info.Firewall status:
•  User account to connect to UCSv1: livechat-sftp

                                        •  Big Data (UCS) SFTP IP address: 10.245.123.29

                                        •  UCS landing directory: /data/tdc/prd/ret/land/livechat



                                        Delimiters used = <del> for delimiter and <ret> for new record

jobs_info.Data Description:
Network outage incidents impacting customers.

                                        Conen Report will be generated with:


                                        Record ID

                                        Impacted Service/Device Details /  FNN /
 
                                        Plant / Equip / Mac Address
 
                                        Outage Source system

                                        Exchange / Node / Plant ID
  
                                        Location  (Co-ords / Address)

                                        Products Impacted

                                        Expected Resolution Time

                                        Current Status
 
                                        Outage Start or Schedule Start  
                                        Outage End or Schedule End
 
                                        SEVERITY

                                        EVENT_TYPE

                                        LAST_TABLE_UPDATE

                                        Out of Scope Technologies


                                        INFRASTRUCTURE TECHNOLOGY

                                        Enterprise All Technology

                                        ITS All Technology

                                        Internet and Hosting Cloud

                                        Internet and Hosting NetTas

                                        Internet and Hosting Telstra

                                        Wireless Enterprise

                                        Wireless Ericsson MultiMediation Platform

                                        Wireless LBS – MPS

                                        Wireless OCS (Online Charging System)

                                        Wireless Policy Charge Rules Function

                                        Wireless WBA-Vendor

                                        Wireline IP Remote
jobs_info.Contact Person Details: Sheldon Egbert (Application Manager), Michael Julian (Technical Contact)
